name: Perseverance (itch) (horyzone)
description:
Perseverance is a quick (?) experience about failing, failing and failing again while pushing farther each time, delaying the inevitable. ( <-- Hop, putting the theme in the description, check ✔)

In this narrative experience / QTE hell, you'll be tasked by a mysterious lady to partake in a strange experiment. Follow her lead and discover what lies behind your inevitable failures.

We are well aware that narrative content is not the best kind of entry to produce for a game jam, but the idea was so enticing in our head and the challenge so out of our comfort zone that we decided to try anyway ! I hope you'll find it intriguing enough to keep trying till the end. Pro tip: Take a pen and a paper if you  want to reach the end... Or have a good memory I don't know...

If you really don't like to torture yourself, you'll be presented with the option to access an alternate ending after your third failure. We promise we won't judge you...
